data.text: @The_Odd_Family Take the butt cuddles. Covid is awful and I hope the negative test sticks.
@The_Odd_Family When I had covid, my test didn’t come back positive until the very end of being sick. My sister’s never showed up at all. I hope you feel better soon though ❤️
@The_Odd_Family Hope he doesn’t fart! Hope you feel better though soon.
